short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience a beautiful new tab page with 5K wallpapers, bookmark manager, search, weather forecast & better history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aurora is now LinkFolio AI - Personalised New Tab Dashboard

As of the most recent version, you will receive a prompt to switch to our new Chrome extension, LinkFolio. Therefore, we highly recommend transitioning to LinkFolio AI. We believe you will appreciate our newest creation as Aurora will no longer be supported.

New Tab page gives you a beautifully designed dashboard packed with clever features and 5K photography. Powerful bookmark manager allows you to load all your existing bookmarks and categorise them into boards & lists. You can sync your bookmarks with google or use in conjunction with other apps like Xmarks. Better history search is simple but functional to give you optimised user experience. You can use search or use quick filters to navigate browser history. Get inspired with daily photo and create the life you want to live. Aurora is a perfect alternative to discontinued Papaly.

ABOUT PERMISSIONS

We do NOT collect any personal informations or data stored within the extension.

We recognise that location sharing/reading website data is a concern for many people (ourselves included) and it is a responsibility that we take very seriously. Your personal informations or data does NOT leave your computer and is used only to improve performance/stability of the extension.
